+)
+

+const (
+	cAckByte  = 6

+
+	cBytesComplex64 = 8

+	cBytesFloat64   = 8
+	cBytesInt16     = 2
+	cBytesInt32     = 4
+	cBytesInt64     = 8
+	cBytesUint16    = 2
+)
+
+// DataType Type of the data contained by a Tensor
+type DataType pb.DataType
+
+// TensorInt Interface to be implemented by the tensors.
+type TensorInt interface {
+	Data() []byte
+	DataSize() int64
+	DataType() DataType
+	GetVal(d ...int) (val interface{}, err error)
+
+	Dim(n int) int
+	NumDims() int
+
+	AsBool() (res []bool, err error)
body:
As\* feel unfamiliar and naming returns isn't necessary here.

How about just

```
Bool() ([]bool, error)
```
